myopenmath.statement:
Suppose we have a periodic function of the form \displaystyle{f{{\left({t}\right)}}}={a}{\sin{{\left({b}{t}\right)}}}+{c} where the vertical shift is \displaystyle{7}, the period is \displaystyle\frac{{8}}{{3}} and the amplitude is \displaystyle{20}.
Write out the function. \displaystyle{f{{\left({t}\right)}}}= Â
